Package io.github.clojang.gradldromus

package io.github.clojang.gradldromus
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AnsiColors
    Utility class for handling ANSI color codes and terminal text formatting.
    CleanTerminalPrinter
    Utility class for clean terminal output with line clearing and formatting capabilities.
    CustomTestListener
    Custom test listener that provides clean, colorized output for test results.
    GradlDromusExtension
    Configuration extension for the GradlDromus plugin.
    GradlDromusPlugin
    Main plugin class for GradlDromus, providing clean and customizable test output formatting.
